explains: adv. 迷失，迷路；步入歧途，堕落
wordGroup: go astray v. 走入歧途；迷路

sentences.en: The judge thought he'd been led astray by older children.
sentences.cn: 法官认为他是被更大的孩子们引入了歧途。

sentences.en: Some day they will lead you astray.
sentences.cn: 总有一天，他们会把你引入歧途的。

sentences.en: How can millions of dollars go astray?
sentences.cn: 数百万美元怎么会丢失了呢？
